title: 【冰块的练手作】飞毯【真正使用地毯的飞毯】
author: 冰块⑨号
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Lighten_Eagle 于 2013-12-20 17:03 编辑 

Good Morning~

这里是冰块⑨号~


最近在下一盘很大的棋……

所以对代码有些生疏了……

练习一下……

下面是棋盘中的棋局——






这次的代码是飞毯~~



悬浮于空中的地毯，没有任何支撑！

站在飞毯上，观赏四处的风景，真是惬意啊！



但是飞毯是一次性的，而且只能往一个方向飞……要停下来的话请先复制黏贴执行边上命令方块的代码……

边上的按钮是执行按钮~



飞毯代码（改变方向请自行修改）（请自行垫一个有电的激活铁轨在下面）







/summon MinecartCommandBlock ~ ~-1 ~ 
{Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
Command:"/setblock ~ ~ ~-1 minecraft:air 0 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~-1 ~ ~-1 minecraft:air 0 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~1 ~ ~-1 minecraft:air 0 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~ ~-1 ~2 minecraft:air 0 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~ ~-2 ~-1 minecraft:redstone_block 0 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~ ~-1 ~-6 minecraft:piston_extension 0 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~ ~ ~-6 minecraft:carpet 3 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~-1 ~-1 ~-6 minecraft:piston_extension 0 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~-1 ~ ~-6 minecraft:carpet 3 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-1 ~-6 minecraft:piston_extension 0 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~1 ~ ~-6 minecraft:carpet 3 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~ ~-2 ~2 minecraft:air 0 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~ ~-1 ~-1 minecraft:activator_rail 0 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~-1 ~-1 ~-1 minecraft:air 0 replace"},
Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-1 ~-1 minecraft:air 0 replace"},
Command:"/tp @p ~ ~ ~-0.5"}复制代码
飞毯急停代码：/summon PrimedTnt复制代码
哦，对了，还有件事，在堆叠的命令方块矿车代码中，越是靠里面的命令越先被执行！
